targets.query: SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM cpu WHERE cpu = 'cpu-total' AND host =~ /^$node$/
SELECT max(used_percent) FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$node$/ and "device" != 'rootfs'  and $timeFilter
SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_containers_running") FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values with key = "host" where engine_host =~ /^$host$/
list.label: node id
list.name: node
list.query: show tag values with key = "host" where engine_host =~ /^$host$/

list.definition: show tag values with key = "container_name" where host = '$node'
list.label: container or service
list.name: container_or_service
list.query: show tag values with key = "container_name" where host = '$node'
